title: Lesson 097: My Daily Phrase German
description: Learn German step by step, day by day, phrase by phrase. In today's show you'll be talking about things you like . Spend 5 minutes with us and gain confidence in speaking German with our 20-week course. You can automatically download each new episode for free by subscribing in iTunes. Please visit our website for more information.
